Title: Golden Pass LNG lead contractor Zachry starts project exit, files for bankruptcy
Description: US construction and engineering company Zachry Group has filed for bankruptcy, initiating a structured exit from the 15.6 mtpa Golden Pass LNG export project in Texas , where it is the lead contractor, due to “financial challenges”.
Author: JS

Title: ICGB launches binding phase to boost capacity at Interconnector Greece-Bulgaria
Description: ICGB, the operator of the 3 billion m3 per year Interconnector Greece-Bulgaria (IGC), has initiated the binding phase of market testing for expanding the pipeline's capacity to 5 billion m3 per year.
Author: JS
